resources:
SmartKeg Fully recharged
in 30 Minutes Your bluetooth is off.
Tap to enable. Tap to enter bluetooth settings and pair with the SmartKeg.
Hint: The password is 1111. SmartKeg not found.
You may be out of range. Checking how much beer you have left.
Do not pour.
**Optional**
Set the desired pressure in the keg. Default Pressure (16 psi) Light Beer (16 psi) Dark Beer (18 psi) Custom Pressure
Notifications Notifications Enable Notifications? Sound` Play Sound? Vibrate Vibrate? LED Flash the LED? Frequency How often to check the keg level Every 30 Minutes
Keg Pump!
